name: Solitaire Zillionaire
description:
Come play and win real cash prizes! Play solitaire against players from around the world to take home the cash!

- Sign up for an account on your first day to get Bonus Cash!

- Sign in and get free coins! Use coins and play for a chance to win real money!

- Get a FREE DEPOSIT BONUS on your first deposit! Deposit any amount and we’ll match 100% of it! Feel Free to withdraw your money with PayPal at any time!

- All games are created equally! Everybody gets the same set of cards when competing. Use your skills to beat your opponents and take home the prize pool!

You’ll be matched with players of the same skill level and receive the same deck of cards. This ensures the game is fair and purely skills-based! Move cards by simply dragging them to your desired position. Take full control of your game and win with your own style! If you love card games, then Solitaire Zillionaire is the perfect choice for you. Play today and start winning your riches!

- You must be 18 years of age or older to play this game.
- Solitaire Zillionaire is completely free to download and play. Note that Cash tournaments are not available in the following states: AZ, AR, IN, IA, LA, ME, MD, SC, MT & SD.

There’s so much more to explore in Solitaire Zillionaire! Stop hesitating and download it now to jump into the fun! It’s highly addictive to play and 100% thrilling, so enjoy, have fun and get ready to take home the money bag!
